summary: A documentary on Brazilian Formula One racing driver Ayrton Senna, who won the F1 world championship three times before his death at age 34.
cast: Ayrton Senna|Reginaldo Leme|John Bisignano|Neide Senna|Richard Williams|Mili Okada|Ron Dennis|Viviane Senna|Alain Prost|Pierre Van Vliet|Vera Lucia Caixeta|Arnaldo Jabor|Xuxa|Jean-Marie Balestre|Martin Donnelly|Nelson Piquet|Jackie Stewart|Sid Watkins|Frank Williams|Patrick Head|Michael Schumacher|Rubens Barrichello|Roland Ratzenberger|Murray Walker|Gerhard Berger|Galvão Bueno|Bussunda|Claire Chazal|Bernie Ecclestone|Emerson Fittipaldi|Itamar Franco|Adriane Galisteu|Damon Hill|Luiz Fernando Lima|Nigel Mansell|Paulo Miklos|Prince Rainier of Monaco|Adrian Newey|Riccardo Patrese|Princess Stéphanie of Monaco
title: Senna
